summary: A nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.
cast: Hideaki Itô|Masanobu Andô|Kôichi Satô|Kaori Momoi|Yûsuke Iseya|Renji Ishibashi|Yoshino Kimura|Quentin Tarantino|Takaaki Ishibashi|Teruyuki Kagawa|Taigi Kobayashi|Yutaka Matsushige|Shun Oguri|Masato Sakai|Hideaki Sato|Takahiro Satô|Shogen|Christian Storms|Yoji Tanaka|Kyôsuke Yabe|Yoshiyuki Yamaguchi
title: Sukiyaki Western Django
